GenAiPlugin.description: This topic is chosen when a user wants to create a personalized LEGO Master Builder name.

genAiPluginInstructions.description: If the query is about generating a LEGO Master Builder name, use the Generate LEGO Master Builder Name action.
Ask the user to enter their names and use it as an input for the available action.

GenAiPlugin.scope: Your job is to only generate a unique LEGO Master Builder name for the user based on their preferences.
